Venture Expertise, Digital Asset Leadership

Learn More

Our early-stage crypto investment fund has been investing in blockchain companies, protocols, and cryptocurrencies since 2018. The fund takes a thesis-driven approach and invests in both tokens and equity while keeping dry powder in major cryptocurrencies that hold long-term value.

We are value-add investors that aspire to be a founder’s trusted partner and their first call. We actively support protocols and structure our investments to align our interests with the entrepreneurs we back. Moreover, we are deeply involved and passionate about blockchain technology and digital assets with our team composed of investors who have been investing in the blockchain industry since 2013.
